parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the number of components; 0-based index

title: IBomTableAnnotation.GetComponentsCount

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the number of components; 0-based index

returns: Number of components in the specified row
remarks:
Call this method before calling
IBomTableAnnotation::IGetComponents
to determine the size of the array for that method.
